mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure images and text scale properly on smaller screens and test across a variety of devices to improve mobile accessibility.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize images and reduce unnecessary scripts to improve load times on mobile and desktop.
seoOptimizationTip: Consider adding more local keywords and improving meta tags for better local search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Simplify navigation by reducing the number of clicks needed to find essential information, especially on mobile.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking form to reduce the number of fields and improve the speed of completing a reservation.
tips: Improve mobile scaling and image optimization
Test booking flow for smoother user interactions
